Package core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DogListener
    React to a dog event (when the player may invoke dog ard)
    Playable
    Round or full game common API
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlliedCard
    Allied card (taupe or dog) representation
    Card
    Card representation
    Field
    Field management
    Game
    The game (contains rounds)
    HarassStrategy
    Aggressive strategy
    IAPlayer
    Computer-powered player
    Player
    Represent a player (alive or not)
    Round
    The small game
    SafeStrategy
    Safe strategy : transforms small rocks, or get more
    StrategyResult
    Action chosen by a strategy (contains card, target and alliedCard)

    Every possible action
    CardType
